alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 20 at 2:26PM CDT until October 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING UNTIL 7 PM FOR FWZS 418...419...429... 430... 431...432...433...436 AND 437... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR MOST LOCATIONS IN SOUTHEAST WYOMING AND THE NEBRASKA PANHANDLE FRIDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423, 425, 434, 435, 436, AND 437... * WIND...West winds gusting 25 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon relative humidity 10 to 15 percent. * HAINES...4 to 5. Areas of 6 near Pine Ridge. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
